survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate new employees' experiences and satisfaction with the current onboarding process to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall onboarding process at our company?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels accurately.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall onboarding process at our company?

questions.question_text: Which of the following onboarding activities did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to understand the most valued components of onboarding.

script.question_text: Which of the following onboarding activities did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How well did the onboarding process prepare you for your role?
questions.client_notes: Another Likert scale question to gauge effectiveness in role preparation.

script.question_text: How well did the onboarding process prepare you for your role?

questions.question_text: Was the information provided during the onboarding process clear and easy to understand?
questions.client_notes: Measure clarity of communication during onboarding.

script.question_text: Was the information provided during the onboarding process clear and easy to understand?

questions.question_text: How long did it take for you to feel fully integrated into your team?
questions.client_notes: Understand the timeline for team integration post-onboarding.

script.question_text: How long did it take for you to feel fully integrated into your team?

questions.question_text: Did you have a dedicated mentor or buddy during your onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to assess mentorship availability.

script.question_text: Did you have a dedicated mentor or buddy during your onboarding?

questions.question_text: If you had a mentor or buddy, how helpful were they in your onboarding experience?
questions.client_notes: Conditional question to evaluate mentor effectiveness.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons, skip logic based on Q6 response.

script.question_text: If you had a mentor or buddy, how helpful were they in your onboarding experience?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the onboarding process could be improved?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback for improvements.

script.question_text: What aspects of the onboarding process could be improved?

questions.question_text: Did you receive all the necessary tools and equipment on your first day?
answer_options: Mostly, but some items were missing
questions.client_notes: Assess readiness of tools and equipment provided on the first day.

script.question_text: Did you receive all the necessary tools and equipment on your first day?
answer_options: Mostly, but some items were missing

questions.question_text: How would you rate the communication from HR and your manager during the onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to evaluate communication effectiveness.

script.question_text: How would you rate the communication from HR and your manager during the onboarding process?

questions.question_text: Were there any specific challenges you faced during the onboarding process? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to identify specific pain points.

script.question_text: Were there any specific challenges you faced during the onboarding process? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend our company's onboarding process to others?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score-style question to gauge overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: Would you recommend our company's onboarding process to others?
